name: Sabeer Nelli
bio: Serial entrepreneur and Member of Forbes Business Council with 15 years of experience. Built Tyler Petroleum into a $60M, 200+ employee Inc 5000 company.

name: Afzal Modak
bio: Former CFO at GE Capital and GSV Investment Fund. Alumnus of the Indian Institute of Technology.

name: Amber Devolk
bio: Former Deputy CCO at Cross River Bank. Served as CCO and AML Officer at Behalf and Applied Data Finance.

name: Justin Timlin
bio: Investor at Blue Star Innovation Partners, Greenspring Associates, and TPG. Georgetown MBA and Venture Capital Competition World Champion.
